metadata.title: CVE-2022-48748 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: net:bridge: vlan: fix memory leak in __allowed_ingress When using per-vlanstate, if vlan snooping and stats are disabled, untagged or priority-taggedingress frame will go to check pvid state. If the port state is forwardingand the pvid state is not learning/forwarding, untagged or priority-taggedframe will be dropped but skb memory is not freed. Should free skb when__allowed_ingress returns false.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
